Usage

Installation

To use Read the Docs, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install sphinx-rtd-theme

Describing Code

To do X, you can use the foobar( ) function:

typedef void (*foobar)(void);

A test for a C typedef declaration. Here is an example of a cross reference to fooptr.

To do Y, you can use the robolib.barfoo() function:

barfoo(a=None, b=None)

A test for a Python function

Parameters:

  • a (datatype) – Some data

  • b (datatype or None) – Optional data

Raises:

BarFooExceptionHandler – If a is invalid

Returns:

Generic Data.

Return type:

datatype

The a parameter should be "x", "y", or "z". Otherwise, robolib.barfoo() will raise an exception.

exception robolib.BarFooExceptionHandler

Raise if the a is invalid
